cw.misc.AboutTimeMissingHelp: The Calendar/Weather mod requires AboutTime by Tim Posney in order to run properly.
cw.seasons.Title: Seasons
cw.seasons.SeasonIntro: Enter the start date and weather modifiers for each season. The Color dropdown changes the color of the weather icon for a visual indication of the season. Entering an @RollTable[] into the 'Table' will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table. Note this will disable FXMaster integration.
cw.seasons.HotterOrColder: Is the season hotter or colder than average?
cw.seasons.DrierOrWetter: Is the season drier or wetter than average?
cw.seasons.SeasonMonthStart: What month does the season start?
cw.seasons.SeasonDayStart: What day does the season start?
cw.seasons.SeasonHourBright: Enter the hour it gets bright
cw.seasons.SeasonHourDark: Enter the hour it gets dark
cw.seasons.SeasonColor: What color do you want to display with the season?
cw.seasons.SeasonRolltable: OPTIONAL: Entering a @RollTable[] will disable advanced weather generation and instead, weather will be generated via the table.
cw.moon.Title: Moons
cw.moon.Intro: Enter the cycle length, current cycle percentage, and eclipse information for the moon(s).
cw.moon.Name: Moon Name
cw.moon.LengthDesc: Enter the length of the lunar cycle from Full Moon to New Moon.
cw.moon.PercentDesc: Enter the current fullness of the moon.
cw.moon.LEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Lunar Eclipse on a given night.
cw.moon.SEclipseDesc: Enter the chance of a Solar Eclipse on a given day.
cw.moon.SEclipseEventIncoming: A Solar Eclipse will occur today.
cw.moon.2ChatHelp: If true, any moon phase changes will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
cw.events.DateReoccuringEvent: Enter the date and description of reoccuring events such as holidays.
cw.events.StartDayHelp: What day does the event start?
cw.events.OneTimeDescription: Enter the date and description of one time events, for example an assassination.The event will be deleted after it is triggered.
cw.events.AddOneTime: Add a new one time event
cw.weather.tracker.extreme.Hurricane: Hurricane or large amounts of flooding
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Scattered: Scattered clouds, but mostly clear today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.SunAsh: The sun is completely obscured by ash, possible ashfall today
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Overcast: Completely overcast with some snow flurries possible.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.OvercastLight: Completely overcast with light freezing rain possible.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LightSnow: A light to moderate amount of snow today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LightRain: Light to moderate freezing rain today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.LargeFreezingR: Large amount of freezing rain today.
cw.weather.tracker.normal.Earthquake: Earthquake, firey rain, and toxic gases today.
AddNewDay: Add a new day of the week
MonthAbbrevHelp: What is displayed instead of the month number if the month is intercalary.
MonthDelHelp: Removes the month from the normal month numbering scheme
ExportCalendarHelp: Export Calendar/Events/Moons to your clipboard. This will not record the current date however.
cw.setting.CalDispNonGmHelp: When checked, clients without GM-level permissions will be able to see the calendar displayed
cw.setting.Weather2ChatHelp: When checked, the weather will be output to chat, displayed only to GM level users.
cw.setting.Display24HHelp: When checked, a 24 hour clock will be used for the time display.
cw.setting.WeatherLabelHelp: When checked, if the FXMaster module is installed, it will generate weather effects such as rain and clouds.
cw.setting.NightCycleLabelHelp: When checked, the scene will undergo a night cycle, darkening during the night and getting brighter during the day.
cw.setting.NoGlobalHelp: When checked, once the scene reaches max darkness, it will disable the scene's Global Illumination
cw.setting.playerSeeWeatherHelp: When checked, players can toggle the weather form.
cw.setting.useSanctionsHelp: When checked, moons will display if they are at High or Low Sanction. This is useful for settings like Dragonlance.
